metadata.dc:author: Castro Cels, A
Rafel Rivera, J
Pijoan Rotgé, P
Centelles Ruiz, M
metadata.dc:description: Cardiac tamponade and the finding of a simple pericardial mass as the first manifestations of a malignant neoplasia from another location are exceedingly rare events. Here we present a patient affected with a lung carcinoma whose first clinical manifestation was the development of a cardiac tamponade that established itself quickly within the context of a mass inside the pericardial cavity and adhered to the left atrium.
metadata.dc:title: Taponamiento pericárdico y masa en la cavidad pericárdica como primera manifestación clínica de una neoplasia pulmonar.
[Pericardial tamponade and a mass in the pericardial cavity as the first clinical manifestation of a pulmonary neoplasms].
